contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Olympic event |event = Luge |games = 2002 Winter |image = [[Image:Luge pictogram.svg|100px]] |caption = Pictogram for luge |venue = [[Utah Olympic Park]] |dates = February 10–14 |competitors = |nations = |prev = [[Luge at the 1998 Winter Olympics|1998]] |next = [[Luge at the 2006 Winter Olympics|2006]] }} The '''[[Luge]]''' competition at the '''[[2002 Winter Olympics|2002 Winter Olympic Games]]''' was held at [[Utah Olympic Park]] in [[Park City, Utah|Park City]]. Three events were staged, taking place from February 10 to February 14. ==Medal summary== ===Medal table=== {| {{RankedMedalTable}} |- | 1 ||align=left| {{flagIOCteam|GER|2002 Winter}} || 2 || 2 || 1 || 5 |- | 2 ||align=left| {{flagIOCteam|ITA|2002 Winter}} || 1 || 0 || 0 || 1 |- | 3 ||align=left| {{flagIOCteam|USA|2002 Winter}} || 0 || 1 || 1 || 2 |- | 4 ||align=left| {{flagIOCteam|AUT|2002 Winter}} || 0 || 0 || 1 || 1 |} ===Events=== {| {{MedalistTable|type=Event}} |- |Men's singles<br>{{DetailsLink|Luge at the 2002 Winter Olympics – Men's singles}} |{{flagIOCmedalist|[[Armin Zöggeler]]|ITA|2002 Winter}} |{{flagIOCmedalist|[[Georg Hackl]]|GER|2002 Winter}} |{{flagIOCmedalist|[[Markus Prock]]|AUT|2002 Winter}} |- |Women's singles<br>{{DetailsLink|Luge at the 2002 Winter Olympics – Women's singles}} |{{flagIOCmedalist|[[Sylke Otto]]|GER|2002 Winter}} |{{flagIOCmedalist|[[Barbara Niedernhuber]]|GER|2002 Winter}} |{{flagIOCmedalist|[[Silke Kraushaar-Pielach|Silke Kraushaar]]|GER|2002 Winter}} |- |Doubles<br>{{DetailsLink|Luge at the 2002 Winter Olympics – Doubles}} |{{flagIOCteam|GER|2002 Winter}}<br>[[Patric Leitner]]<br>[[Alexander Resch]] |{{flagIOCteam|USA|2002 Winter}}<br>[[Mark Grimmette]]<br>[[Brian Martin (luger)|Brian Martin]] |{{flagIOCteam|USA|2002 Winter}}<br>[[Chris Thorpe]]<br>[[Clay Ives]] |} ==References== *[http://www.todor66.com/olim/2002w/Luge_Men_Singles.html 2002 luge men's singles results] *[http://www.todor66.com/olim/2002w/Luge_Men_Doubles.html 2002 luge men's doubles results] *[http://www.todor66.com/olim/2002w/Luge_Women_Singles.html 2002 luge women's singles results] {{Olympic Games Luge}} {{EventsAt2002WinterOlympics}} [[Category:Luge at the Winter Olympics|2002]] [[Category:2002 Winter Olympics]] [[Category:2002 Winter Olympics events]] [[Category:2002 in luge]]
